entry.title: Yum Install build-essentials
entry.content: I was once stucked in installing build-essentials which is for Debian/Ubuntu.I could not find any packages like build-essentials in yum.However this helped me out. bash sudo yum install kernel-devel kernel-headers

entry.title: Accelerate Yum Installation
entry.content:
Yum is a great tool for manage dependencies and easy to use.However actually there is a way to speed up the installation.
Fastestmirror is a tool that will help yum determin what mirror is fastest and to use.
To install on Fedora 17 bash sudo yum install yum-fastestmirror Of course you could customize the fastestmirror configuration easily sudo vim /etc/yum/pluginconf.d/fastestmirror.conf So when you next install a package from the network,I hope you could feel it much faster.
